Package demoworld.controller

Interface MainController

All Known Implementing Classes:
Controller
public interface MainController
Interface that indicates anything that implements it supports all the functions of a main controller.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    openCharacterFeatureRemoval()
    Instructs the view to open the search screen configured for searching the Character's Features and configures the pick button to be set to fire a removal event .
    void
    openCharacterSpecialtyRemoval()
    Instructs the view to open the search screen configured for searching the Character's Specialtys and configures the pick button to be set to fire a removal event .
    void
    openRulesFeatureSearch()
    Instructs the view to open the search screen configured for searching the RuleBook's Features that the current Character meets the requirements for.
    void
    openSheet()
    Instructs the view top open the Character sheet page
    void
    openSpecialtySearch()
    Instructs the view to open the search screen configured for searching the RuleBook's Specialtys that the current Character meets the requirements for.
    void
    updateCharacter(Character character)
    Updates the main view and all relevant children with the new Character data.

  • Method Details

    • updateCharacter

      void updateCharacter(Character character)
      Updates the main view and all relevant children with the new Character data.
      Parameters:
      character - The new character state

    • openSheet

      void openSheet()
      Instructs the view top open the Character sheet page

    • openRulesFeatureSearch

      void openRulesFeatureSearch()
      Instructs the view to open the search screen configured for searching the RuleBook's Features that the current Character meets the requirements for. As well as configures the pick button to add a chosen feature to the character.

    • openCharacterFeatureRemoval

      void openCharacterFeatureRemoval()
      Instructs the view to open the search screen configured for searching the Character's Features and configures the pick button to be set to fire a removal event .

    • openCharacterSpecialtyRemoval

      void openCharacterSpecialtyRemoval()
      Instructs the view to open the search screen configured for searching the Character's Specialtys and configures the pick button to be set to fire a removal event .

    • openSpecialtySearch

      void openSpecialtySearch()
      Instructs the view to open the search screen configured for searching the RuleBook's Specialtys that the current Character meets the requirements for. As well as configures the pick button to add a chosen specialty to the character.
